description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Overload recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Overload Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup tub softened chocolate cookie ice cream

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the crushed biscuits with the melted butter and press firmly into the base of 4 dessert dishes.
Scoop the ice cream over the top of the biscuit base. Drizzle with the caramel or spoon over the dulce de leche (if used) and decorate with white and milk chocolate shavings. Serve immediately.
